column4: Anyone can tell me how to tell ubuntu not to lock my display every time I close the lid?
Is it a known issue with Dapper that Firefox crashes every 10 minutes?
i dont think ive heard of that but it could be say flashh thats causeing it if the page has a flash video on it
no flash actually
whats the link you trying to open?
wotif.com.au. Works for a bit, then boom!
do you have java installed for ff?
the site is javascript (all of the site)
i have java and flash installed, yes. I guess it's irrelevant if the site is JS
its html with javascript in it are you using the version of java you installed?
what do you mean?
what does java -version say when typed in terminal?
gij (GNU libgcj) version 4.1.0 (Ubuntu 4.1.0-1ubuntu8)
type sudo update-alternatives --config java and pick the java that you installed
done. Now what? How's Java relevent if the site is JS-only?
now type java -version adn tell me output
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_06-b05)
now restart ff and open that site
done
crashing?
Takes a few minutes to crash. Need to go to bed now. I'll check tomorrow.
we'll see... thanks anyway.
ff crashed on me again. The site was open, but that's not what I was browsing (I was doing a reload on /.). Going to bed for real now.
